text:
Here we explore [[Help]] for DocumentDrivenDesign of software project. Our aim is to use TiddlyWiki as our document format, and then explore how we can socialise this work using FedWiki and other tools. In particular we wish to explore the use of LocalIntelligence in the authroing process.

{{$:/plugins/nico/projectify/ui/dashboard/Dashboard}}
title: About

text: When we need help we call for a [[Guide]]. Our initial focus might be software, but we seek to explore the use of TiddlyGuide's in the context of taking any form of action, either at the individual or the group / collective level.
title: Help

text:
<<interstitial>>

@@.interstitial
* ''16:12'' Handlers are important, but not as much as scripts....
* ''18:43'' Let's get good at Help as it is the basics of any Guide.
@@
title: Working on
